::DrillBit::

He opens a panel on his chest, pulls ous a wire, and plugs it into
Scorponok's head. The data is transfered, and DrillBit returns the wire
to himself.
"now when you reach Lond, switch your voice to this program. Simple
voice commands will tell the ship to de-cloak, and to open the hatch.
Good luck."
